title: HP to cut about 6,000 jobs by 2028, ramps up AI efforts
description: HP Inc. said on Tuesday it expects to cut between 4,000 and 6,000 jobs globally by fiscal 2028 as part of a plan to streamline operations and adopt artificial intelligence to speed up product development, improve customer satisfaction and boost productivity.

title: The Fed and Big Tech Re-Raise Investors’ Spirits
description: Markets appear to be hoping again that the central bank will cut rates next month, and that the artificial intelligence boom has room to run.
content: Andrew here. Could Google win the artificial intelligence race? Over the past week, it has introduced a Gemini chatbot model that has Silicon Valley in awe: “I’ve used ChatGPT every day for 3 years. Just spent 2 hours on Gemini 3. I’m not going back,... [881 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Genovation's Mentis: Pioneering Secure AI Solutions with Global Aspirations
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: The AI boom is based on a fundamental mistake
description: Neuroscience indicates language is distinct from thought, raising questions about whether AI large language models are a viable path to artificial general intelligence.
